Name: Miner Ultra Rag Smash
About the game: A very fun physics-based combat to play with your friends locally or online with remote play. The matches are never the same and everyone will have a lot of fun. It's a 2 to 4-player local/remote play online party game. Real physics. Play versus combat for 2 to 4 players. The characters lose pieces of the body. Funny foods and crazy items. 100+ levels. Have a lot of fun with your friends.
